name: Add new Cognito Forms entries as rows in Smartsheet
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically transferring new entries from Cognito Forms to Smartsheet. With this template, every time a new entry is submitted in Cognito Forms, Make will create a corresponding row in Smartsheet, ensuring your data is organized and easily accessible for further analysis and collaboration. This integration eliminates manual data entry, saving you time and reducing the risk of errors. Perfect for teams looking to enhance their workflow efficiency.
